trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Mobile
There were no other sightings in Mobile on or around September 30th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend Eric Johnson was deer hunting on my land in Wilcox county when we say a round like object in the air it came down then went up fast so we waited a second then it came back down and paused for like 4-5 minutes we got a good look at it to make sure it was a UFO and it was so we ran inside to get my mom came back outside and it was gone and till this day no one takes me serious about what we saw. When we saw it we were like shocked and scared at the same time
Summary: Circle like object with lights all around it
